snippet: An internal review of how the United Nations handled the bloody final months of Sri Lanka's civil war in 2009 has concluded that the response was "a grave failure of the U.N."
abstract: An internal review of how the United Nations handled the bloody final months of Sri Lanka's civil war in 2009 has concluded that the response was "a grave failure of the U.N."

headline.main: Leaked Report on Sri Lanka Critical of U.N.
